Keywords: Champions , Defenders , Horsemen , Jean Grey School For Higher Learning , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Warren Worthington III
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. FREE: Remove Angel's RALLY die to move up to 5 squares. If you did, after resolutions you may choose a standard friendly character with the X-Men keyword he moved through during that action and place that character adjacent to him. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls. When a character gains a RALLY die, place a die with the matching result on their card.)

Goop
I actually think this piece is deceptively good. Have moira give him a rally early, then have him "swoop" in with another melee guy so they are both in charge range. Then charge with Angel, then charge with the other who now has Angels empower. Not bad at all. Maybe not SR worthy but still quite useful for 45pts if you are running a good amount of melee.

Sculpt and keywords aside this is a very useable Angel he just needs a little boost.

Considering we've only had 3 x-force warrens about each around 5 years apart, a 45 point option would be really welcome on a team that desperately needs taxis, EVA can't carry everyone. I honestly am curious about the flavor text on the rest of his card and whether this is a strange case of the dial designers and sculpt designers showing up to the final meeting having never spoken about what they were making...
